reviewText: I enjoy havin some  of the Drake and Josh episodes on dvd so i can  remember  what happend. For any fan that likes the show should buy  them.

With the deal struck between Nickelodeon and Amazon, we finnaly have various titles being released that I thought we would never see. Thank you Amazon! Now if only you could strike the same deal with Buena Vista Home Entertainment and get titles like X-Men, Spiderman, MMPR, and Digimon in Region 1 boxsets. I would gladly pay my hard earned money for titles like that.

was stuck paying for this because some kids took my sons new Fire tablet away from him. They ordered several episodes of kids shows without even knowing my password because Amazon video came preinstalled with my info on it directly from Amazon

I like the show. But guys like drake have all the luck. Drake is like a jock in one show he said the dentist gave him $200 to show his niece a good time. Then he said he got 6 burritos free. This has never happen to me in my lifetime. All people should be treated with respect and not based on looks. I have been harassed and abused for no reason because I don't have that certain look like drake has.
